channel.title: Tonics on DMN developer documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Tonics on DMN developer documentation

item.title: Ticket widget
item.description: The ticket widget lists events, dates and tickets. If a single event is listed with a single date it will only show the tickets. If an event with multiple dates is listed then it will show the calendar first. If multiple events/event brands (item-ids) are listed then the events list will be displayed first. Setting up the ticket widget The widget is included using javascript. Below is a list of valid attributes for the script tag in order to customise it.
